Reviews/Synopsis
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Please go to the following website for detailed information:

Cheng Tzu-hao (Chien Hsiao-hao) and Kao Ying-wei (Chang Chan-peng), both wooing the same girl Ah Tzu (Li Yen-shen), are transferred to the same Action Squad to help crack a number of robberies committed by a notorious robber/killer Ku Lung (Wang Lung-wei) from Shantung. They inadvertently offend their immediate superior Beast King (Lin Hui-huang), and land themselves in a tight spot.

Ku has been selling loots to underworld leader Chin Lao Pa (Chang Chuan). In exchange for his co-operation and help, Ku snatches a batch of police guns from Sergeant Philip Chen (Kao Fei) and his colleagues, and uses them to gun down a group of ChinÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s rival Vietnamese businessman. While trying to obtain a clue from his taxi dancer friend, Philip is bumped off by Ku.

Ku plan another big hold-up and seeks ChinÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s help. Chin double-crossed Ku, and Ku finds his house surrounded by the police. Ku craftily escapes with his men and only his brother (Yin Hsing Lin) is killed. After finishing off Chin and his men, Ku takes Cheng hostage and leads his men back to his base. He madly guns down those who try to betray him and takes Cheng to the spot where his brother was killed. Kao comes to the rescue and is trapped and killed. After inflicting heavy casualties on the police, Ku succumbs to his wound.
